description: Gets a graph summary for a property graph. When invoking this operation in a Neptune cluster that has IAM authentication enabled, the IAM user or role making the request must have a policy attached that allows the neptune-db:GetGraphSummary IAM action in that cluster.

nested_items.name: statusCode
nested_items.description: The HTTP return code of the request. If the request succeeded, the code is 200.

nested_items.name: version
nested_items.description: The version of this graph summary response.

nested_items.name: lastStatisticsComputationTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp, in ISO 8601 format, of the time at which Neptune last computed statistics.

nested_items.name: graphSummary
nested_items.description: The graph summary.

nested_items.name: numNodes
nested_items.description: The number of nodes in the graph.

nested_items.name: numEdges
nested_items.description: The number of edges in the graph.

nested_items.name: numNodeLabels
nested_items.description: The number of distinct node labels in the graph.

nested_items.name: numEdgeLabels
nested_items.description: The number of distinct edge labels in the graph.

nested_items.name: nodeLabels
nested_items.description: A list of the distinct node labels in the graph.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: edgeLabels
nested_items.description: A list of the distinct edge labels in the graph.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: numNodeProperties
nested_items.description: A list of the distinct node properties in the graph, along with the count of nodes where each property is used.

nested_items.name: numEdgeProperties
nested_items.description: The number of distinct edge properties in the graph.

nested_items.name: nodeProperties
nested_items.description: The number of distinct node properties in the graph.
(string) ---
(integer) ---

nested_items.name: edgeProperties
nested_items.description: A list of the distinct edge properties in the graph, along with the count of edges where each property is used.
(string) ---
(integer) ---

nested_items.name: totalNodePropertyValues
nested_items.description: The total number of usages of all node properties.

nested_items.name: totalEdgePropertyValues
nested_items.description: The total number of usages of all edge properties.

nested_items.name: nodeStructures
nested_items.description: This field is only present when the requested mode is DETAILED. It contains a list of node structures.

nested_items.name: count
nested_items.description: Number of nodes that have this specific structure.

nested_items.name: nodeProperties
nested_items.description: A list of the node properties present in this specific structure.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: distinctOutgoingEdgeLabels
nested_items.description: A list of distinct outgoing edge labels present in this specific structure.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: edgeStructures
nested_items.description: This field is only present when the requested mode is DETAILED. It contains a list of edge structures.

nested_items.name: count
nested_items.description: The number of edges that have this specific structure.

nested_items.name: edgeProperties
nested_items.description: A list of edge properties present in this specific structure.
(string) ---
